# python-cloud-utils-289772

AWS configuration utilities for Python applications.

## Installation

```bash
pip install python-cloud-utils-289772
```

## Usage

```python
from python_cloud_utils_289772 import get_config, get_client

# Get AWS configuration
config = get_config()

# Get S3 client
s3 = get_client('s3')
```
